title: partymonsters_jvla
author: partymonsters_jvla
content: Party Monsters Clubyour chance to be part of the next big thing in crypto.----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Party Monsters is a WHITELIST-ONLY project, consisting of Party Monsters Coin and Party Monsters NFT collection.---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Party Monsters Club is centered around 6666 unique Party Monsters, drifting through Metaverse on an yet-to-be-revealed blockchain, and owning one opens a WHOLE NEW realm of OPPORTUNITIES.You don't just basically get back what you spent on minting in an airdrop after mint, but you also secure yourself a wide list of benefits that owning a Party Monsters NFT brings,such as:— a free VIP in the Party Monsters night club, every time you attend (Yes, we're opening a night club)— a welcome drink (bottle) on the house, when you decide to visit us— Party Monsters Coin airdropped to your wallet in the value of what you spent on minting your Party Monster (yep, it’s essentially a free mint!)— 50% of the night club’s earnings airdropped to those who minted themselves a Party Monsters during pre-sale, for 1 year— Party Monsters NFT staking— a phyisical replica of the Party Monster you minted— whitelist spot in all future projects associated to or created/run by Party Monsters Club, both — NFT collections and cryptocurrency projects… and more.BUT.it's a... WHITELIST-ONLY NFT project. Not everyone can mint. Not everyone can enjoy in all those perks.The Party Monsters NFT collection whitelist requirement is participation in the upcoming Party Monsters Coin coin-sale.And BOY. Party Monsters Coin is SOMETHING. If you missed out on Shiba, Pepe and other coins that just skyrocketed, maybe you're lucky to be here this early.About Party Monsters CoinWhitelist only, EXCLUSIVE Party Monsters Club currency.50% off during pre-sale.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Private PRE-SALE price: 0.00000001$-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Private SALE price: 0.00000002$-----------------------------------------------------------------------------PLEASE NOTE THAT NOT EVERYONE WILL BE ELIGIBLE, NOT EVERYONE CAN PURCHASE THE PARTY MONSTERS COIN.To be eligible to purchase, you must be whitelisted. And getting whitelisted WON'T BE EASY.You have to show us you're completely standing behind Party Monsters Club projects first.Proceed to our whitelist page and apply:---------------APPLY FOR THE WHITELIST---------------More details-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Total supply: 600,000,000,000,000 Party Monsters Coins-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Available for purchase during the private sale and pre-sale: 70%-----------------------------------------------------------------------------The remaining 30% is reserved for airdrops to Party Monsters NFT pre-sale minters.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Essentially, the community gets to control 100% of the supply. Party Monsters Coin will be 100% decentralized from the start.No team dumping. No "advisor" dumping. The market will freely decide the Party Monsters Coin price without the heavy sell walls, and the team will work hard to make the Party Monsters Coin a huge success story for all our early supporters.Please proceed to; - Party Monsters Coin official website: https://partymonsterscoin.tech - Party Monsters Club official website: https://partymonstersclub.info and learn more about the great Party Monsters project.DON'T FORGET to join our Discord, Telegram, Twitter and Instagram:https://linktr.ee/partymonstersclub

comments.author: partymonsters_jvla
comments.body: Please don't hesitate to ask anything! All questions and queries are welcome.

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: What about your token ecosystem, what will you do to make your token needed?so far what makes it interesting is only the price of your token which is still so cheap.Is your team's information anonymous?

comments.author: partymonsters_jvla
comments.body: Hey, thanks for the questions! The team is public,  details are on the Twitter page. Party Monsters Coin has several utilities, including; buybacks using the club's profits; airdrops by all associated projects; buy drinks, tickets and more at the night club; get whitelisted for the upcoming Party Monsters Club utility NFT drop; and, as you already mentioned, the dirt cheap price We'll be adding more utilities down the line to make the coin more attractive on secondary markets

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: Thank you for your response as well.Yes, I saw a photo of your team on your Twitter page. However, you do not mark their Twitter accounts. Someone may wish to confirm your team members and contact them based on the job.

comments.author: partymonsters_jvla
comments.body: and they're welcome to do so  Pardon my question, but is everything okay with this forum?I don't see much activity here. Are projects still being announced here? Thanks!

comments.author: the rise
comments.body: Quote from: partymonsters_jvla on April 30, 2023, 05:06:44 PMand they're welcome to do so  Pardon my question, but is everything okay with this forum?I don't see much activity here. Are projects still being announced here? Thanks!of course, if you make announcements regularly here it will definitely add insight slowly more and more people will see your project because of the diligent updates that you do just like social media
